title: Keenage
content: I was just wondering what the average age of the keen community here is.  I'm 22, got into Keen when I was 8.  I thought it was so cool how I was the same age as he was.  I remember my favorite shirt was this purple t-shirt.  Anyway, I get the impression that a lot of you are younger than I am.

title: Re: Keenage
content:
17... Although I'll soon be 18 in 4 months.


As for when I started:

It was April of 2000. For the next year I had gotten every single Commander Keen game (1-6, Dreams, and fangames like Norp, CK2000, Dopefish 1 & 2, Isis II). Over the following two years, I gathered (often by hand with screen thief) every single graphic I could get on Commander Keen.

I found out about GameMaker in 2001 on this forum and I have been trying ever since them to make a commander keen fangame. (Though I still haven't produced one yet)~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: The Good Ol' Days......
content:
17....in december I will be 17.5......

I have been playing commander keen about 12 years now. I even had a gravis gamepad, it didn't come with it, but it was still cool. I remember wanting to build my own megarocket, lol.....

I grew up with all of the classic dos games, Keen 1-6, Wolfenstein 3D, ROTT, Crystal Caves, Cosmo's Cosmic Adventure, Duke Nukem 1-2, Secret Agent, Raptor: Call of the Shadows, Math and Word Rescue....

Then I got Windows 95 and it erased all of them.......

title: Re: The Good Ol' Days......
content: Heh, I can still remember all the buzz at our local PC user group when Keen 4 came out, and how new all the graphics looked.  Then there was just as much excitement later on when Keen 5 was released - I still have the review in their old monthly magazine.  Ah, those were the days [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

title: Re: The Good Ol' Days......
content:
*sigh* gettin older and older, yet Keen retains his youthful vigour. Dammit you two! Now I'm all remminiscient!

*goes to play Keen for next two hours*Szevvy Forever!
And Spleen never!

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.jpg[/img]
